mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a set of three phtographs on one piece of heavy stock. From left to right, a front portrait, a building, and a left profile. The back of the photograph has several faint handwritten notes. There is also a stamp for "Geo. W. Brown, Photographer." The folder containing the photograph notes that this is "Clarence M. Wood at Va. Union U., 1918?"
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Clarence M. Wood at Va. Union U., c. 1918 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Portraits
Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby)
Virginia Union University (Richmond, Va.)
